amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funds for the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration Account by $5 million for the purpose of investing in a VA Claims Digital Scanning Program to help reduce the VA disability claims backlog.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds available to the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration Account by $5 million and increase the funds available to the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration Account by the same amount for the purpose of investing in a VA Claims Digital Scanning Program to help reduce the VA disability claims backlog.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
